instructions.title: How To Change Your Personal Information on Your Fandango Account
instructions.before: Fandango does not give you an option to Delete your Account.  Therefore, you need to contact customer service through your computer browser and request that your account be deleted.  However, this does not always work.  Due to this, It is suggested that you go in and change or delete your personal information where you can prior to contacting customer service.  These steps will teach you how to do so.
instructions.after: This should make all your information useless to Fandango.

qnAnswers.question: Why should I change my Personal Information prior to deleting my account?
qnAnswers.answer: Changing your personal information is a way to make your data useless to Fandango.  Because Fandango does not make it easy to delete your account we suggest that you go in and cancel your credit card, change your email address, and change any other information linked to you. Now, if they do not delete you account, none of the information can trace back to you anyway.

qnAnswers.question: What happens to my Credits when I delete My Account?
qnAnswers.answer: You will lose all credits associated with your account.  You cannot transfer them to another account.  It is recommended that you use all leftover credits prior to deletion.

qnAnswers.question: Do I have to Delete my Account to Unsubscribe to emails?
qnAnswers.answer: No.  To unsubscribe to Fandango emails [please click here] (https://www.fandango.com/email-unsubscribe?ed_rid=_edid).

steps: To log onto your Fandango Account Setting [Click here] (https://www.fandango.com/account/settings?accounttype=email&login=success)
Change all Basic Personal Information so it cannot identify you anymore and Click Save
Change your email address so its not linked to your primary email account and Click Save
Make sure both setting are to turned to Off

slides.alt: Fandango-Change Personal Information from Website. Step 1: To log onto your Fandango Account Setting [Click here] (https://www.fandango.com/account/settings?accounttype=email&login=success)
slides.title: Account Settings

slides.alt: Fandango-Change Personal Information from Website. Step 2: Click Basic Information
slides.title: Basic Information

slides.alt: Fandango-Change Personal Information from Website. Step 3: Change all Basic Personal Information so it cannot identify you anymore and Click Save
slides.title: Change Personal Information

slides.alt: Fandango-Change Personal Information from Website. Step 4: Click Change Email
slides.title: Change Email

slides.alt: Fandango-Change Personal Information from Website. Step 5: Change your email address so its not linked to your primary email account and Click Save
slides.title: Change Email & Save

slides.alt: Fandango-Change Personal Information from Website. Step 6: Click Sharing
slides.title: Sharing

slides.alt: Fandango-Change Personal Information from Website. Step 7: Make sure both setting are to turned to Off
slides.title: Turn to Off

slides.alt: Fandango-Change Personal Information from Website. Step 8: Click Payment Method
slides.title: Payment Method

slides.alt: Fandango-Change Personal Information from Website. Step 9: Click Delete
slides.title: Delete

instructions.title: How To Delete Your Fandango Account
instructions.before: Fandango does not give you an option to Delete your Account.  Therefore, you need to contact customer service through your computer browser and request that your account be deleted.  However, this does not always work.  Due to this, It is suggested that you go in and change or delete your personal information where you can prior to contacting customer service.  These steps will teach you how to contact customer service.
instructions.after: You should receive a confirmation email that your account has been deleted. There are some cases where people have found that there information was not able to be deleted . This is why we recommend that you change all your personal information including your email address making your account useless to them.

qnAnswers.question: Why should I change my Personal Information prior to deleting my account?
qnAnswers.answer: Changing your personal information is a way to make your data useless to Fandango.  Because Fandango does not make it easy to delete your account we suggest that you go in and cancel your credit card, change your email address, and change any other information linked to you. Now, if they do not delete you account, none of the information can trace back to you anyway.

qnAnswers.question: What happens to my Credits when I delete My Account?
qnAnswers.answer: You will lose all credits associated with your account.  You cannot transfer them to another account.  It is recommended that you use all leftover credits prior to deletion.

qnAnswers.question: Do I have to Delete my Account to Unsubscribe to emails?
qnAnswers.answer: No.  To unsubscribe to Fandango emails [please click here] (https://www.fandango.com/email-unsubscribe?ed_rid=_edid).

steps: To Contact Customer Service [Please Click here] (http://fandango.custhelp.com/app/ask).
Type the Email Address associated to your Fandango Account
Type your First and Last Name
Under What was the Email Content Type Other
This is the Confirmation Message you will receive explaining that Customer Service will Contact you within 72 hours

slides.alt: Fandango-Delete Account from Website. Step 1: To Contact Customer Service [Please Click here] (http://fandango.custhelp.com/app/ask).
slides.title: Customer Support

slides.alt: Fandango-Delete Account from Website. Step 2: Under Category Click Other
slides.title: Other

slides.alt: Fandango-Delete Account from Website. Step 3: Type the Email Address associated to your Fandango Account
slides.title: Email Address

slides.alt: Fandango-Delete Account from Website. Step 4: Type your First and Last Name
slides.title: Contact Information

slides.alt: Fandango-Delete Account from Website. Step 5: Type a Deletion Request
slides.title: Deletion Request

slides.alt: Fandango-Delete Account from Website. Step 6: Under What was the Email Content Type Other
slides.title: Other Email Content

slides.alt: Fandango-Delete Account from Website. Step 7: Click Continue
slides.title: Continue

slides.alt: Fandango-Delete Account from Website. Step 8: This is the Confirmation Message you will receive explaining that Customer Service will Contact you within 72 hours
